00019 #ifndef __BSDF_OREN_NAYAR_H__
00020 #define __BSDF_OREN_NAYAR_H__
00021 
00022 CCL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00023 
00024 typedef struct BsdfOrenNayarClosure {
00025     float m_a;
00026     float m_b;
00027 } BsdfOrenNayarClosure;
00028 
00029 __device float3 bsdf_oren_nayar_get_intensity(const ShaderClosure *sc, float3 n, float3 v, float3 l)
00030 {
00031     float nl = max(dot(n, l), 0.0f);
00032     float nv = max(dot(n, v), 0.0f);
00033     float t = dot(l, v) - nl * nv;
00034 
00035     if (t > 0.0f)
00036         t /= max(nl, nv) + FLT_MIN;
00037     float is = nl * (sc->data0 + sc->data1 * t);
00038     return make_float3(is, is, is);
00039 }
00040 
00041 __device void bsdf_oren_nayar_setup(ShaderData *sd, ShaderClosure *sc, float sigma)
00042 {
00043     sc->type = CLOSURE_BSDF_OREN_NAYAR_ID;
00044     sd->flag |= SD_BSDF | SD_BSDF_HAS_EVAL;
00045 
00046     sigma = clamp(sigma, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00047 
00048     float div = 1.0f / (M_PI_F + ((3.0f * M_PI_F - 4.0f) / 6.0f) * sigma);
00049 
00050     sc->data0 = 1.0f * div;
00051     sc->data1 = sigma * div;
00052 }
00053 
00054 __device void bsdf_oren_nayar_blur(ShaderClosure *sc, float roughness)
00055 {
00056 }
00057 
00058 __device float3 bsdf_oren_nayar_eval_reflect(const ShaderData *sd, const ShaderClosure *sc, const float3 I, const float3 omega_in, float *pdf)
00059 {
00060     if (dot(sd->N, omega_in) > 0.0f) {
00061         *pdf = 0.5f * M_1_PI_F;
00062         return bsdf_oren_nayar_get_intensity(sc, sd->N, I, omega_in);
00063     }
00064     else {
00065         *pdf = 0.0f;
00066         return make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00067     }
00068 }
00069 
00070 __device float3 bsdf_oren_nayar_eval_transmit(const ShaderData *sd, const ShaderClosure *sc, const float3 I, const float3 omega_in, float *pdf)
00071 {
00072     return make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00073 }
00074 
00075 __device float bsdf_oren_nayar_albedo(const ShaderData *sd, const ShaderClosure *sc, const float3 I)
00076 {
00077     return 1.0f;
00078 }
00079 
00080 __device int bsdf_oren_nayar_sample(const ShaderData *sd, const ShaderClosure *sc, float randu, float randv, float3 *eval, float3 *omega_in, float3 *domega_in_dx, float3 *domega_in_dy, float *pdf)
00081 {
00082     sample_uniform_hemisphere(sd->N, randu, randv, omega_in, pdf);
00083 
00084     if (dot(sd->Ng, *omega_in) > 0.0f) {
00085         *eval = bsdf_oren_nayar_get_intensity(sc, sd->N, sd->I, *omega_in);
00086 
00087 #ifdef __RAY_DIFFERENTIALS__
00088         // TODO: find a better approximation for the bounce
00089         *domega_in_dx = (2.0f * dot(sd->N, sd->dI.dx)) * sd->N - sd->dI.dx;
00090         *domega_in_dy = (2.0f * dot(sd->N, sd->dI.dy)) * sd->N - sd->dI.dy;
00091         *domega_in_dx *= 125.0f;
00092         *domega_in_dy *= 125.0f;
00093 #endif
00094     }
00095     else {
00096         *pdf = 0.0f;
00097         *eval = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00098     }
00099 
00100     return LABEL_REFLECT | LABEL_DIFFUSE;
00101 }
